trans-unit.source: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Define um objeto usado para desenhar linhas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A Pen draws a line of specified width and style.
trans-unit.target: Uma caneta desenha uma linha de largura especificada e estilo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property to draw several varieties of dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>propriedade desenhar diversas variedades de linhas tracejadas.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The line drawn by a Pen can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
trans-unit.target: A linha desenhada por uma caneta pode ser preenchida em uma variedade de estilos de preenchimento, incluindo texturas e cores sólidas.

trans-unit.source: The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de preenchimento depende de pincel ou de textura que é usada como o objeto de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A> property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws lines.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>propriedade determina como o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenha linhas.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: É desenhada como se eles são retângulos preenchidos, com as características de <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade do novo <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>é definido como 1 (o padrão).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the fill properties of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina as propriedades de preenchimento desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com a cor especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Color>está definida como a cor especificada pelo `color` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade é definida como 1 (o padrão).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que indica a cor desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> e <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>é definido como a cor especificada no `brush` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor especificado no `width` parâmetro e as unidades são definidos como <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o `brush` parâmetro também especifica a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade desse <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: Um `width` 0 resultará no <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina as características deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> e <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Color>está definida como a cor especificada pelo `color` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor especificado no `width` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: Um `width` 0 resultará no <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que indica a cor desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a largura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws closed curves and polygons.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade determina como o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenha curvas fechadas e polígonos.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values—<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>—will change the appearance of a drawn line.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>enumeração Especifica cinco valores; no entanto, apenas dois valores —<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>— irá alterar a aparência de uma linha desenhada.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>é o valor padrão para essa propriedade e especifica que a largura da caneta é centralizada no contorno da curva ou polígono.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>para essa propriedade especifica se a largura da caneta é dentro do contorno da curva ou polígono.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: The other three values, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, will result in a pen that is centered.
trans-unit.target: Os outros três valores, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, resultará em uma caneta centralizado.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> that has its alignment set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>que tem seu alinhamento definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>produzirá resultados não confiáveis, às vezes, desenho na posição de inserção e, às vezes, na posição centralizada.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> dash caps.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, uma caneta de inserção não pode ser usada para desenhar linhas compostas e não é possível desenhar linhas tracejadas com <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>caps. de traço</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref> that represents the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref> que representa o alinhamento para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de alinhamento é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina os atributos deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Assigning this property causes the pen to draw filled lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir essa propriedade faz com que a caneta desenhar linhas preenchidas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina os atributos deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Brush property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de pincel é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that can be cast to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que pode ser convertido em um <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Color property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de cor é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de valores que especifica uma caneta composta.

trans-unit.source: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.
trans-unit.target: Uma caneta composta desenha uma linha de composta formada por espaços e linhas paralelas.

trans-unit.source: A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha composta é composta de linhas paralelas e espaços de largura variável alternados.

trans-unit.source: The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Os valores na matriz especificam os pontos de partida de cada componente da linha composta em relação à largura da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro valor na matriz Especifica onde o primeiro componente (uma linha) começa como uma fração da distância entre a largura da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: O segundo valor na matriz Especifica o início do próximo componente (espaço) como uma fração da distância entre a largura da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends.
trans-unit.target: O valor final na matriz Especifica onde o último componente termina.

trans-unit.source: Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Suponha que você deseja uma caneta para desenhar duas linhas paralelas em que a largura da primeira linha é 20 por cento da largura da caneta, a largura do espaço que separa as duas linhas é 50 por cento da caneta ' s largura e a largura da segunda linha é 30 por cento da largura da caneta.

trans-unit.source: Start by creating a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> and an array of real numbers.
trans-unit.target: Comece criando um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>e uma matriz de números reais.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property.
trans-unit.target: Defina a matriz composta, passando a matriz com valores 0.0 e 1.0, 0,7 e 0,2 para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Não defina essa propriedade se o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tem sua <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de números reais que especifica a matriz composta.

trans-unit.source: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos da matriz devem ser aumentar ordem, não é menor que 0 e não é maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: The CompoundArray property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CompoundArray está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um limite personalizado para usar no final das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> que representa o limite usado no final das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomEndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CustomEndCap está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um limite personalizado para usar no início das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> que representa o limite usado no início das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomStartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CustomStartCap está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de proteção usado no final os traços que compõem a linhas tracejadas desenhadas com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Não defina essa propriedade como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>se o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tem sua <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning and end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de proteção usado no início e no final dos traços que compõem a linhas tracejadas desenhadas com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DashCap está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância do início de uma linha para o início de um padrão de traço.

trans-unit.source: The distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: A distância do início de uma linha para o início de um padrão de traço.

trans-unit.source: The DashOffset property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DashOffset está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de personalizado traços e espaços.

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property for this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Atribuindo um valor diferente de `null` para essa propriedade definirá a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>propriedade para este <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos de `dashArray` matriz definir o comprimento de cada traço e espaço no padrão de traço.

trans-unit.source: The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro elemento define o comprimento de um traço, o segundo elemento define o comprimento de um espaço, o terceiro elemento define o comprimento de um traço e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, cada elemento deve ser um número positivo diferente de zero.

trans-unit.source: The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de cada traço e espaço no padrão de traço é o produto do valor do elemento na matriz e a largura do <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de números reais que especifica os comprimentos dos traços e espaços em linhas tracejadas alternados.

trans-unit.source: The DashPattern property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de DashPattern é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo usado para linhas tracejadas desenhadas com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property, makes up lines drawn with this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>para essa propriedade especifica que um padrão personalizado de traços e espaços, definidas por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>propriedade, faz com que as linhas desenhadas com esta <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> and the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor dessa propriedade é <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>e o valor da <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>é de propriedade `null`, a caneta desenha linhas sólidas.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> that represents the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo usado para linhas tracejadas desenhadas com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashStyle property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DashStyle é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos usados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>para ser realocada para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>estava ocupando.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de proteção usado no final das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de proteção usado no final das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The EndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EndCap está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que ela é recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de junção for the ends of duas linhas consecutivas desenhado com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação de linha é a área comum que é formada por duas linhas cujas extremidades atenderam ou se sobrepõem.

trans-unit.source: There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round.
trans-unit.target: Há três estilos de associação de linha: esquadria, Bisel e de ida e volta.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a line join style for a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example.
trans-unit.target: Quando você especifica um estilo de junção de linha para um objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>, que o estilo de junção será aplicado a todas as linhas conectadas em qualquer objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>desenhados usando essa caneta. A ilustração a seguir mostra os resultados do exemplo de associação de linha com bisel.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: ![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens")
trans-unit.target: ![Canetas](~/add/media/pens5.gif "canetas")

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"></xref> that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"> </xref> que representa o estilo de junção for the ends of duas linhas consecutivas desenhado com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The LineJoin property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade LineJoin está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite de espessura da associação em um canto mitre.

trans-unit.source: The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de esquadria é a distância da interseção das paredes linha dentro da associação para a interseção das paredes linha fora da junção.

trans-unit.source: The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de esquadria pode ser grande, quando o ângulo entre duas linhas é pequeno.

trans-unit.source: The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width.
trans-unit.target: O limite de esquadria é a taxa máxima permitida de comprimento de esquadria a largura do traço.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.0f.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 10.0.

trans-unit.source: If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Se o comprimento de esquadria da junção de interseção excede o limite de junção, em seguida, a junção será chanfrada para mantê-la dentro do limite da junção de interseção.

trans-unit.source: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: O limite de espessura da associação em um canto mitre.

trans-unit.source: The MiterLimit property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MiterLimit está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a matriz de transformação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> por especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a matriz de multiplicação especificada no `matrix` parâmetro para a matriz de transformação para a operação de multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> objeto pelo qual multiplicar a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a matriz de transformação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> por especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeration element (either prepend or append) specified by the `order` parameter to carry out the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>elemento de enumeração (preceda ou acrescentar) especificado pelo `order` parâmetro para executar a operação de multiplicação.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> pela qual multiplicar a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to perform the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual executar a operação de multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> can draw solid lines, filled lines, or textured lines, depending on the style specified by a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>para desenhar linhas sólidas, linhas preenchidas ou linhas de textura, dependendo do estilo especificado por um membro do <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType>enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o estilo das linhas desenhadas com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resets the geometric transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to identity.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a matriz de transformação geométrica para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> a identidade.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle.
trans-unit.target: Gira a transformação geométrica local pelo ângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a rotação para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Como a forma de uma caneta é circular, uma rotação não tem nenhum efeito visível, a menos que a caneta é dimensionada a direção do eixo x ou y.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Gira a transformação geométrica local pelo ângulo especificado na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Como a forma de uma caneta é circular, uma rotação não tem nenhum efeito visível, a menos que a caneta é dimensionada a direção do eixo x ou y.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> que especifica se deve ser acrescentam ou precedem a matriz de rotação.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a transformação geométrica local por fatores especificados.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a matriz de dimensionamento para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator ampliar a transformação a direção do eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator ampliar a transformação a direção do eixo y.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a transformação geométrica local por fatores especificados na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator ampliar a transformação a direção do eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator ampliar a transformação a direção do eixo y.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> que especifica se deve ser acrescentam ou precedem a matriz de escala.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values that determine the style of cap used to end lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores que determinam o estilo da extremidade usado para terminar linhas desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de proteção a ser usado no início das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de proteção a ser usado no final das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning or end of dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de proteção a ser usado no início ou fim das linhas tracejadas desenhado com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de proteção usado no início das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de proteção usado no início das linhas desenhadas com isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The StartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade StartCap está definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cópia da transformação geométrica para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define uma forma elíptica para a dica de caneta.

trans-unit.source: This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Essa elipse é obtido da forma circular padrão aplicando a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a parte de tradução da matriz é ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Como a matriz retornada e pela transformação de propriedade é uma cópia da transformação Geométrico da caneta, descarte da matriz quando você não precisa mais dela.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> que representa a transformação geométrica <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de transformação é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Converte a transformação geométrica local, as dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the translation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a tradução para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: O valor da conversão em x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: O valor da conversão em y.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Converte a transformação geométrica local, as dimensões especificadas na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: O valor da conversão em x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: O valor da conversão em y.

trans-unit.source: The order (prepend or append) in which to apply the translation.
trans-unit.target: A ordem (preceda ou acrescentar) na qual aplicar a conversão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, in units of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, em unidades do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: You can access the unit of measure of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object using its <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar a unidade de medida do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto usando seu <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The unit of measure is typically pixels.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a unidade de medida é pixels.

trans-unit.source: A Width of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the Width were 1.
trans-unit.target: Resulta em uma largura de 0 a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Width property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Width é definida em um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, como aqueles retornados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.
